name: HENTAI CASINO \ 性赌场
description: HENTAI CASINO \ 性赌场 is a card game based on a very famous game mechanic solitaire, in the game you will need to assemble a deck of cards in a certain order in a specially allotted time, for each completed level you will open the next one and a new girl will appear with it.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: WINDOWS 处理器: pentium g4560 内存: 1 GB RAM 图形: geforce gt 730 存储空间: 需要 200 MB 可用空间
